column1: g.recolher? ou armazenar? dados pessoais sobre outros utilizadores ou visitantes

column2: This is the email that gets sent to the admin when a member request upgrade membership.

[header]

[sender_title] has requested to upgrade membership. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host]/admin/user/upgrade-requests?email=[email]

[footer]

[header]

[sender_title] has requested to upgrade membership. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host]/admin/user/upgrade-requests?email=[sender_email]

[footer]

[header] {PT}

[sender_title] has requested to follow you. Please click the following link to sign in and confirm this request:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
